AddedHay: Added {0} pieces of hay to the silo.
WrongFishType: Your {0} doesn't want to live in a {1} pond.
WrongFishTypeCoral: {0} can only be placed in a {0} Pond.
CantPutInPonds: The {0} wouldn't be happy in there.
NoFish: Fish can be placed into this pond.
Construction_ChooseLocation: Where do you want to manage buildings?
BigBarn_Description: Houses 8 barn-dwelling animals. Allows animals to give birth. Unlocks goats.
BigCoop_Description: Houses 8 coop-dwelling animals. Comes with an incubator. Unlocks ducks.
BigShed_Description: Doubles the size of the shed. The interior can be decorated.
Cabin_Description: A home for a friend! Subsidized by the town agricultural fund.
DeluxeBarn_Description: Houses 12 barn-dwelling animals. Comes with an auto-feed system. Unlocks sheep and pigs.
DeluxeCoop_Description: Houses 12 coop-dwelling animals. Comes with an auto-feed system. Unlocks rabbits.
FishPond_Description: Raise fish and harvest their produce. Fish multiply over time.
GoldClock_Description: Prevents debris from appearing on your farm. Keeps fences from decaying.
Greenhouse_Description: A place to grow crops from any season, year round!
JunimoHut_Description: Junimos will harvest crops around the hut for you.
Mill_Description: Allows you to mill wheat, beets and rice.
Shed_Description: An empty building. Fill it with whatever you like! The interior can be decorated.
ShippingBin_Description: Throw items inside to sell them overnight.
Silo_Description: Allows you to cut and store grass for feed.
SlimeHutch_Description: Raise up to 20 slimes. Fill water troughs and slimes will create slime balls.
Stable_Description: Allows you to keep and ride a horse. Horse included.
Well_Description: Provides a place for you to refill your watering can.
PetBowl_Description: Provides a dedicated home for one pet.
